head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MACRI, ROSE A.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MACRI, ROSE A.

block.p: MACRI-Rose A. On October 5, 2000. Sister of the late Angie, Mary Lynch, Fanny Geraci and the late Edward and Frank Macri. Visiting Sunday and Monday 2-5PM and 79PM at M.J. Smith Sons Funeral Home, 248 Prospect Park West, Brooklyn, New York. Mass of the Resurrection Tuesday 10AM at Holy Name Church. Interment at St. John's Cemetery.
